A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I don't even know what to say...I feel so disappointed. I liked The Force Awakens...But the Last Jedi lost the opportunity to make something epic...
- new characters are not interesting at all
- lots of cheesy jokes (i fear the future now that Disney controls everything: Marvel\, Star Wars\, etc...)
- lots of mystery are just dropped
- and a lot more that i can't say so i will not make spoilers...

I thought i would never say this\, but i am really considering not seeing anymore Star Wars movies in theatres...
